welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stockport, where charming historic architecture meets modern amenities. Explore the famous Hat Works Museum, stroll along the scenic River Mersey, and discover all the unique attractions this vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: The Purple Pakora
restaurants.description: The Purple Pakora is a indian restaurant located in Poynton.
restaurants.address: 9 London Rd South, Poynton, Cheshire, SK12 1JX

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal of Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Manchester Airport, opened in 1989 and primarily serving long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
